New Records: Aaron Judge hit his 55th home run of the season
Key Match Events: The Yankees swept the Athletics in a three-game series
Luis Gil allowed four runs on five hits over 5.1 innings
Ian Hamilton gave up a two-run double
Clay Holmes ran into trouble in the bottom of the eighth
Luke Weaver got out of the inning and then retired the side in order to close out the game
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Judge was named Game MVP
He continues building on his stellar American League MVP candidacy
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Yankees return home to the Bronx for a big three-game set against the Baltimore Orioles starting on Tuesday
Aaron Judge has a.327 average and 1.109 OPS over his last 15 games
Gleyber Torres has a.325 average and 11 RBI and has hits in all but three games down the stretch during the final month of the season
Others: The Yankees homered three times in their 7-4 win over the Oakland Athletics
Jasson Dominguez has gotten off to a bit of cold start since being called back up to the big leagues, but he got the Yanks on the board in this one with his second home run of the season
